name: You're Getting On My Nerves!
text: Can be used during your next turn after your monster is destroyed by battle or card effect. Increase the ATK of 1 Rank 4 or lower WATER Xyz Monster by 500 until the end of the turn. Can also be used if your opponent controls a monster with 2500 ATK or more. This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.
